## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 12,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | The recommended order size of 12,000 units ensures sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand for the next 5 days while considering a margin of error and lead time. This order size avoids exceeding the minimum purchase quantity threshold for the discount, preventing unnecessary inventory build-up and potential stock obsolescence. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommendation is less than the player's planned order size of 6881 units. This is a more conservative approach that accounts for potential demand fluctuations and avoids overstocking.  |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.2 days                               |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.6 days                               |
| Comments                          | The recommended order size, combined with the current inventory level, ensures a robust buffer to manage demand fluctuations and avoids potential stockouts. This approach prioritizes meeting sales demand and avoids unnecessary inventory holding costs, optimizing inventory turnover. |
